name: OpsBerry AI
headline: Secure your identity sprawl with AI.
description: OpsBerry AI defends against human and non-human identity breaches using AI to continuously discover, prioritize, and remediate vulnerabilities in your identity sprawl. Our AI-powered identity security posture management platform, trained with popular cyber security and compliance frameworks, provides comprehensive visibility and contextualization across your user accounts, service accounts, API keys, OAuth apps, and more, keeping your organization safe from identity-driven attacks.

founders.name: Carlos Feliciano, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO of OpsBerry AI. Over a decade of experience in Infrastructure, monitoring, and operations at YC-backed startups and large enterprises. AWS Solutions Architect. Love PC gaming, fitness, the beach, and just good vibes!

founders.name: Casey Wilcox, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO of OpsBerry AI

markdown:
raw_markdown="OpsBerry AI as achieved SOC2 Type II Compliance 🚀[ Check it out →](https://opsberry.ai/<https:/blog.opsberry.ai/opsberry-ai-is-now-soc2-type-ii-complaint/>)[OpsBerry AI as achieved SOC2 Type II Compliance 🚀](https://opsberry.ai/<https:/blog.opsberry.ai/opsberry-ai-is-now-soc2-type-ii-complaint/>)
[OpsBerry AI![OpsBerry AI](https://opsberry.ai/assets/opsberry_header_logo.1828b6cc.svg)](https://opsberry.ai/</>)
Open menu
[Why OpsBerry](https://opsberry.ai/</#whyopsberry>)[Platform](https://opsberry.ai/</#features>)[Data & Security](https://opsberry.ai/</security>)[AI Copilot](https://opsberry.ai/</#aicopilot>)[Blog](https://opsberry.ai/</blog>)[Careers](https://opsberry.ai/<https:/app.dover.com/jobs/opsberryai>)
[ Login ](https://opsberry.ai/<https:/app.opsberry.ai/login>)[ Book a demo ](https://opsberry.ai/</#contactform>)
[![YC](https://opsberry.ai/assets/yc_logo_white.cd3ac483.svg)](https://opsberry.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/LVm-opsberry-ai-secure-your-identity-sprawl>)
AI-POWERED IDENTITY SECURITY & OBSERVABILITY PLATFORM 
#  Observe, secure and govern your 
# API Keys|
Secure and govern your human and non-human identities with real-time, AI-driven identity discovery, investigations, and automations. 
[ Book a demo ](https://opsberry.ai/</#contactform>)
![](https://opsberry.ai/assets/hero-new-temp.4d535ee6.svg)
##  Trusted by engineering and security teams everywhere 
> “We've been using OpsBerry AI to simplify the management of IAM across our cloud infrastructure, and SaaS products. Their platform ensures that we remain, secure, compliant, and efficient in our day-to-day operations and especially around maintain compliance as a public company. Before OpsBerry we had to develop, and manually run scripts to fetch, collate, and review our IAM configurations. This was very time-consuming, error-prone, and difficult to maintain. OpsBerry AI has really simplified this process by providing a single pane of glass to view, and manage all our IAM identity configurations and really made managing our cloud identity sprawl seamless. ” 
> Cris Kim
> • 
> Director of Engineering and founding engineer at Barkbox 
> ![Barkbox](https://opsberry.ai/assets/barkbox-logo.4eb68874.svg)
##  IAM is evolving  Human and non-human identities are your biggest security risk and your biggest asset. 
###  Unknown Unknown Identities
Context and visibility into your human identities and NHIs are extremely limited by current cloud security and IAM solutions.
###  Excessive Privilege and Access
Human and non-human identities (NHIs) often maintain unchecked, permanent privileged access to enterprise environments, creating significant security risks and exposure points.
###  Exposed and Unprotected
Unchecked privileges create security gaps that leave your environment open to attack.
# ~$4.84 Million
#  The average cost of an identity breach in 2024. With a staggering 35-to-1 ratio of human and non-human identities (NHIs) per employee—an ever-growing number—organizations face exponentially increasing risks of identity-driven attacks. 
##  Introducting OpsBerry AI  Observe, secure, and govern your human and non-human identities as scale. 
###  Real-time discovery & inventory.
Continuous discovery and inventory of your human and non-human identities across your SaaS, IaaS, PaaS, and your on-prem environments.
###  Track identity behavior and access patterns.
Analyze and track both human and non-human (NHI) identity behavior and access patterns to detect anomalies and potential security risks.
###  AI-Powered investigations.
Leverage AI-driven investigations to identify and remediate security risks and threats across your human and non-human identities.
###  Real-time Identity Monitoring
Detect and respond to identity-driven threats in real-time with advanced alerting and proactive breach prevention.
###  Advanced identity lifecycle management.
Automate and streamline identity lifecycles end-to-end with AI-driven policy-based attestation, provisioning, and deprovisioning.
###  Continious audit & compliance
Continuously audit and monitor your human and non-human identities to ensure compliance with industry and regulatory standards.
###  AI-powered automation & remediation
Effortlessly integrate your current security SOAR, ITSM, or SEIM stack to secure and scale your IAM with no-code workflow builder to streamline identity management, enforce policies, and respond to threats in real-time—no coding required.
###  Enterprise ready.
Configurable authentication, easy provisioning, secure data management, and a 99.9% availability SLA. SOC2 Type 1 and Type 2 (coming soon) compliant.
##  Features 
##  Real-time discovery and inventory. 
Continious discovery and inventory your human and non-human (NHI) identities across SaaS, IaaS, PaaS, and other environments. 
[ Book a demo ](https://opsberry.ai/</#contactform>)
![inventory features](https://opsberry.ai/assets/InventoryFeaturesImage.4ba25310.svg)
##  Detect anomalies and suspecious behavior. 
Proactively get alerted and respond to identity-driven attacks with automated workflows while our AI copilot. 
[ Book a demo ](https://opsberry.ai/</#contactform>)
![ISPM Automation](https://opsberry.ai/assets/AnomDetectLanding.1e37183c.svg)
![Investigate](https://opsberry.ai/assets/investigatebehavior.05b654c2.svg)
##  Lightning fast, AI-Driven investigations. 
When alerts are triggered, our AI copilot gathers and analyzes contextual data to help you accelorate your investigations and response time. 
[ Book a demo ](https://opsberry.ai/</#contactform>)
##  Automate your IAM lifecycles. 
Automate and dynamically trigger AI-Powered workflows with our no-code drag and drop workflow editor for key rotations, policy updates, onboarding, offboarding, and much more. 
![automation group](https://opsberry.ai/assets/automateworkflow.fe9a5af2.svg)
## SEAMLESS INTEGRATION EXPERIENCE One click integration setup 
Simply enter your read only credentials and OpsBerry will gather your identity data from your cloud, IDP, and internal services. 
[ Book a demo ](https://opsberry.ai/</#contactform>)
##  GPT-Powered Identity AI Copilot  Force multiply your identity security with AI. 
###  Pre-trained AI models means no data training required.
Our AI models are pre-trained, output generation only, and we do not use any of your data for model training so you can rest assured your data is safe and secure.
###  AI trained on popular security and compliance frameworks.
Our AI copilot is trainined on popular public documentation, security and compliance frameworks, and best practices to help you make the most accuracate, well informed decisions possible to securing your identity sprawl.
###  Your 24/7 Identity Security Posture expert.
Our baked-in AI copilot is always on and always ready to help you detect, assess, and remediate identity risks faster and keep your identity sprawl secure.
![](https://opsberry.ai/assets/socii.aaebd39e.png)
## Security First Industry-leading security & Data Privacy 
    Security and privacy are our top priorities because we know they're yours. We adhere to industry-leading security frameworks and never use your data to train our models.
[ Learn More ](https://opsberry.ai/</security>)
## Schedule a demo
First name
Last name
Your company

Tell us about your needs
Agree to policies
By selecting this, you agree to the [Privacy Policy](https://opsberry.ai/<https:/app.termly.io/document/privacy-policy/4bdc598b-d505-4869-ad9d-08bb3c47ec09>) and [Cookie Policy](https://opsberry.ai/<https:/app.termly.io/document/cookie-policy/03dcdac4-ef7c-40b7-8601-075bc1c5d5da>).

generated_description:
**Company Overview: OpsBerry AI**

**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** Not specified  
**Team Size:** 2 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S23  
**Group Partner:** Garry Tan  

**Mission Statement:** Secure your identity sprawl with AI.  

---

**What They Do:**

OpsBerry AI is on a mission to protect organizations from identity breaches—both human and non-human. Their platform leverages advanced AI technology to continuously discover vulnerabilities, prioritize them, and remediate potential attacks tied to identity exploitation. Think of them as your virtual security guard for digital identities.

The platform provides extensive visibility across various types of accounts including user accounts, service accounts, API keys, and OAuth apps. This translates into enhanced security against identity-driven threats, which are rapidly becoming some of the most significant risks facing companies today. In fact, the average cost of an identity breach is projected to be around **$4.84 million** in 2024.

---

**Key Features:**
- **Real-time Discovery & Monitoring:** Continuously tracks human and non-human identities across multiple environments (SaaS, IaaS, PaaS).
- **AI-Powered Investigations:** Utilizes artificial intelligence to conduct investigations and identify security risks based on behavior and access patterns.
- **Automated Identity Lifecycle Management:** Streamlines the processes for onboarding, offboarding, and managing identity policies without the need for coding.
- **Compliance and Audit Ready:** Keeps your identity management compliant with industry standards through continuous audits.
- **Integration Ease:** A simple one-click setup allows for seamless integration with existing security systems.

---

**Significant Achievements:**
- Recently achieved SOC2 Type II Compliance, showcasing their commitment to security and data privacy.

---

**Customer Feedback:**
Cris Kim, Director of Engineering at Barkbox, remarked on how OpsBerry AI has simplified identity management across their infrastructure, transforming a previously labor-intensive process into a streamlined, efficient system. This highlights how valuable OpsBerry AI can be for organizations, especially those managing complex cloud environments.

---

**Conclusion:**
In a landscape where identity risks are escalating, OpsBerry AI emerges as a crucial player equipped with cutting-edge technology. By focusing on real-time security and compliance, they are not just addressing a need; they're redefining what effective identity management looks like. For organizations keen on securing their identities, a demo of their platform could be a worthwhile next step.

For more details, visit their website: [OpsBerry AI](https://opsberry.ai)
